id.description: An identifier for the redis cache instance.

host.description: Hostname or IP address of the exposed Redis endpoint used by clients to connect to the service.

port.description: The port number of the exposed Redis endpoint

read_endpoint.description: Hostname or IP address of the exposed readonly Redis endpoint. Standard tier only. Write requests must target 'host'.

read_endpoint_port.description: The port number of the exposed readonly redis endpoint. Standard tier only. Write requests should target 'port'.
